title: Sara Evans-Lacko: Global workplace depression [Video]
itunes:author: Dr Sara Evans-Lacko
description: Contributor(s): Dr Sara Evans-Lacko | A world first study shows that workplace depression is now a global issue, costing countries billions of dollars a year in lost productivity. Dr Sara Evans-Lacko discusses the economic costs of depression in eight different countries and the urgent need for governments and employers to tackle mental health issues.
